andygrove commented on pull request #3663: ARROW-4377: [Rust] Implement std::fmt::Debug for PrimitiveArrays
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3663#discussion_r257466697
 
 

 ##########
 File path: rust/arrow/src/array.rs
 ##########
 @@ -248,6 +249,29 @@ impl<T: ArrowNumericType> PrimitiveArray<T> {
     }
 }
 
+impl<T: ArrowNumericType> fmt::Debug for PrimitiveArray<T> {
+    fn fmt(&self, f: &mut fmt::Formatter) -> fmt::Result {
+        write!(
+            f,
+            "PrimitiveArray<{:?}> {{ len: {:?}, values: [",
+            T::get_data_type(),
+            self.len()
+        )
+        .unwrap();
 
 Review comment:
   It would be better to return `fmt::Result(Error)` rather than call unwrap here

comments.body: Please add "[Rust]" in the issue title. One minute I thought it was C++ :)
